welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Adel, a charming city known for its history, architecture, and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Departure Lounge
terminals.description: The departure lounge offers a variety of shops, restaurants, and amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport. A premium option is also available for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linton-On-Ouse Airport offers domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linton-On-Ouse Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.
